title: Brazil crane collapse kills two
description: Two people have died after a crane collapsed at a stadium that is due to host the opening ceremony of the 2014 Football World Cup in Brazil.
content:
Two people have died after a crane collapsed at a stadium that is due to host the opening ceremony of the 2014 Football World Cup in Brazil.

The crane reportedly fell on to the Arena Corinthians stadium in the country's largest city, Sao Paulo, on Wednesday, destroying parts of the stands.
